title: TeamProfile exposes partially sensitive information through GraphQL
vulnerability_information_html:
I noticed there is new field team_profile added and using the graphql below the latest serious report and reports received in three months were exposed
{"query":"query Dashboard_report_severity_breakdown_table($first_0:Int!) { query { id, ...F0 } } fragment F0 on Query { _team4g1Zqs:team(handle:\"security\") { _structured_scopes3TsuIg:structured_scopes(first:$first_0) { edges { node { _id, asset_identifier, reports { total_count, count_by_severity }, id }, cursor }, pageInfo { hasNextPage, hasPreviousPage } }, _reports42Gng6:reports(without_scope:true) { total_count, count_by_severity }, team_profile{_id,disclosed_reports_in_last_year_count,latest_report_created_at,latest_serious_report_created_at,reports_received_in_three_months_count}, _id, id }, id }","variables":{"first_0":100}}

If this is public information i can close this by myself (my reputation is very low) but i think it's not and worth to report it

Impact

Information disclosure of no of reports received in 3 months time and other information not in the current UI

profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.
profile.name: HackerOne
